name: Super Conductor (Willlll683, katogar)
description:
Super Conductor is an action-towerdefence game where you should defend your energy core while it charges the shield generator. Mighty turrets will help you with that. But not everything is so simple. Wires are ripped apart and you have nothing to fix it. So you have to connect it by youself.

The game was created in 48h  for the GMTK 2021 game jam. The theme was “JOINED TOGETHER“.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - to move

E - to connect wires

LMB - to push enemies

How to play:
  • Your goal is to charge the Energy core.
  • Hold "E" near the wires to connect it.
  • Connect wires leading to Energy core to charge it.
  • Connect wires leading to turret to power it up.
  • Click left mouse button near the enemies to push them.
Credits:
  • Party Monster Duo Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • RPG Monster Partners PBR Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • Fatty Poly Turret Free by Fatty War
  • It's a Pipe Dream Kitbash Pack by One Potato Kingdom
  • Translucent Crystals by SineVFX
